mapper.insert: insert into user (user_ID, user_PWD, user_Nickname, user_Address,user_Location,user_Profile) values( #{user_ID}, #{user_PWD}, #{user_Nickname}, #(user_Address}, Point('#{user_LocationX}','#{user_LocationY}'), #{user_Profile})
mapper.select: select user_ID, user_PWD, user_Nickname, user_Address, user_Location, user_EXP, user_Profile, user_Date from user where user_ID = #{user_ID}
mapper.update: update user set user_ID=#{user_ID}, user_PWD=#{user_PWD}, user_Nickname=#{user_Nickname}, user_Address= #{user_Address}, user_Location = Point('#{user_LocationX}','#{user_LocationY}'), user_EXP=#{user_EXP}, user_Profile=#{user_Profile}, user_Date=#{user_Date} where user_ID = #{user_ID}
mapper.select: select user_ID, user_PWD, user_Nickname, user_Address,user_Location, user_EXP, user_Profile, user_Date from user order by user_ID desc, user_Date desc
